plot: Rick provides the family with a solution to their problems, freeing him up to go on an adventure led by Morty.

Rick introduces a new invention to his family, a Meeseeks box, which can generate silly (but short-lifespanned) blue creatures named Meeseeks, which can help the family with any task they need solving. However, things go wrong rather quickly. Meanwhile, Morty gets to lead Rick on an adventure for once.
